mapper.select: select menu_code, substr(menu_name,0,instr(menu_name,'-')-1) as menu_cate, substr(menu_name,instr(menu_name, '-')+1) as menu_name, menu_price, store_note from store_menu where menu_code like #{license_number} || '%' and substr(menu_name,0,instr(menu_name,'-')-1) = (select substr(menu_name,0,instr(menu_name,'-')-1) as menu_cate from store_menu where menu_code like #{license_number} || '%' and rownum <= 1)

select substr(menu_name,0,instr(menu_name,'-')-1) as menu_cate, max(rowid), to_number(max(substr(menu_code,(instr(menu_code,'M')+1)))) as menu_code from store_menu where menu_code like #{license_number} || '%' group by substr(menu_name,0,instr(menu_name,'-')-1) order by menu_code

select menu_code, substr(menu_name,0,instr(menu_name,'-')-1) as menu_cate, substr(menu_name,instr(menu_name, '-')+1) as menu_name, menu_price, store_note from store_menu where menu_code like #{license_number} || '%' and substr(menu_name,0,instr(menu_name,'-')-1) like #{menu_cate}
select nvl(max(menu_name),'not') as menu_name from store_menu where menu_code like #{license_number} || '%'
